workspace.title: Home
workspace.description: The home view contains all your workspaces. You can create new workspaces using the ➕ buttons.

workspace.title: Workspace manager
workspace.description: The workspace manager is used for quickly creating courses and concept.

workspace.title: Course mapper
workspace.description: The course mapper is used for drawing links between concepts to define prerequisites.

project.title: Using the project list
project.description: Watch the video to better understand how to use the project list.

project.title: Project overview
project.description: The project overview shows all the templates, user workspaces and merges in your project. You can also manage templates, invite users and create merges.
